Sorry for yelling at ya, Kinger, I missed your apology post. And as 
for saying Hell Beast's spark is offline, yes, I would say that that 
is major moding, as well as quite alot of this battle was.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
> once again i apoligize. I did not mean to send it and i admit even 
though it 
> was childish. I am sorry. Now i wish to put it behind us and get 
things going.
